content: this dishtowel pattern was created as a matching kitchen towel to go with my cloudy days dishcloth pattern 1 a step by step video tutorial is available for this pattern https //youtu be/nrwfkuwk_p8 > subscribe to my newsletter 2 to be notified when new patterns come out pattern info stitches used in this pattern single_crochet half_double_crochet finished size of the dishtowel 13 inches wide x 16 inches tall hook size 5 00mm yarn a total of 225 yards of a #4 medium-weight cotton yarn is used for this towel if using two colors you would want 195 yards for color a and about 30 yards for color b 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cloudy-days-dishcloth 2 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
